name: Line Today Feed by Tannysoft
author: Tannysoft

sections.description:
Just upload this plugin to WordPress and activate it. The plugin will create rss feed for line today application.

Official development of Line Today feed is on GitHub, with official stable releases published on WordPress.org. The GitHub repo can be found at https://github.com/tannysoft/line-today-feed. Please use the Support tab for potential bugs, issues, or enhancement ideas.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/line-today-feed-by-tannysoft directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
Where can I find the new RSS Feed created by this plugin?

  • The feed can be found at https://www.example.com/feed/linetoday
sections.changelog:
1.1.0

  • Update code for LINE TODAY.

1.0.1

  • Update RSS Feed created by this plugin.

1.0.0

  • First public version.
